price: (Yεbεka akyerε wͻn sε): “Dwuma (pa) a modiiε no ho nti no, monfa anigyeε nnidi na monom".
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
